SEARCH

Uses of Package
org.klojang.jdbc

  • Classes in org.klojang.jdbc used by org.klojang.jdbc
    Class
    Description
    BindInfo
    BindInfo objects allow you to determine how values are bound into a PreparedStatement.
    KlojangSQLException
    A RuntimeException that may either wrap an SQLException or indicate another error condition while processing or executing SQL.
    Quoter
    Escapes and quotes values according to the target database's quoting and escaping rules.
    ResultSetBeanifier
    Converts the rows in a JDBC ResultSet into JavaBeans or records.
    ResultSetMappifier
    Converts the rows in a JDBC ResultSet into Map<String, Object> pseudo-objects.
    SQL
    Encapsulates a user-provided SQL statement.
    SQLBatchInsert
    SQLBatchInsert specializes in saving potentially very large batches of JavaBeans to be saved to the database.
    SQLBatchInsertBuilder
    A builder class for SQLBatchInsert instances.
    SQLExpression
    A special string wrapper object that functions as a signal to Klojang JDBC that the wrapped string must be treated as a native SQL expression and hence not escaped or quoted.
    SQLInsert
    Facilitates the execution of SQL INSERT statements.
    SQLInsertBuilder
    A Builder class for SQLInsert instances.
    SQLQuery
    Facilitates the execution of SQL SELECT statements.
    SQLSession
    An SQLSession is used to initiate and prepare the execution of SQL.
    SQLStatement
    Abstract base class for SQLQuery, SQLInsert and SQLUpdate.
    SQLUpdate
    Facilitates the execution of UPDATE, DELETE and DDL statements.
    Transformer
    Transformers enable you to modify values before they are saved to the database.
